sections.heading: to 69-15-16 - Repealed.
sections.text: Repeals.— Laws 1987, ch. 234, § 84 repealed 69-15-1 to 69-15-16 NMSA 1978, as enacted by Laws 1887, ch. 57, § 10 and Laws 1933, ch. 153, §§ 60, 62, 63, 65 to 67, and 70, relating to safety regulations in coal mines, effective July 1, 1987. For present comparable provisions,see69-8-1 to 69-8-15 NMSA 1978.
